title: Command Small Picture Hanging Strips, Damage Free Hanging Picture Hangers, No Tools Wall Hanging Strips for Living Spaces, 18 White Adhesive Strip Pairs(36 Command Strips)
description: Command White Small Picture Hanging Strips let you decorate how you want, when you want, without damaging surfaces. A great home improvement item, these picture hangers stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or sticky residue. Use these wall hanging strips to hang picture frames, college dorm decor, wooden letters, nursery decor, calendars or even to create a gallery wall. Simply mount these picture strips on painted walls, finished wood, painted concrete cinder blocks, laminate, glass, metal and tiles and enjoy the damage free hanging of your favorite decorations. Perfect for home renovators and college students, use these Command Picture Hanging Strips in your home, office, apartment or dorm room to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included; follow the directions closely to use the 3M Wall Hanging Strips correctly. A clever decorating solution that doesn’t damage surfaces, these wall hanger strips will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains 18 pairs of small white picture hanging strips. Four adhesive strip pairs hold up to 4 pounds with a maximum frame size of 8 x 10 inches. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage free with Command.
